import sys

for __ in range(input()) :
    n = input()
    lists = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    ans = []
    GLflag = True
    for i in range(n-1) :
        if GLflag :
            if lists[i] > lists[i+1] :
                lists[i] , lists[i+1] = lists[i+1] , lists[i]
            GLflag = False
        else :
            if lists[i] < lists[i+1] :
                lists[i] , lists[i+1] = lists[i+1] , lists[i]
            GLflag = True
    print " ".join(str(i) for i in lists)
